page.title: 15SHOPPING
page.content:
{BARLBOROUGH SHOPS.}A hairdressers,a post office,a paper shop and a carpet shop. {RENISHAW SHOPS.}A post office,a grocers,an offlicence,a pet shop,a hairdressers and a fish and chip shop. {MASTIN MOOR.}A paper shop, a grocers and a fish and chip shop. {MOBILE FACILITIES.}A butchers, a library,a fish monger,a grocers,a potato lorry,a fish and chip van,a green grocers,an ice cream van,a bread and cake van, coal deliveries and a milk delivery to the door step.
Most People do their main weekly shopping in the surrounding towns.The local shops tend to be used by the elderly and people without cars.They are also useful for the buying of odd items that have been forgotten on the main shopping trip.
